item.title: There is a dead fox and cat in the middle of the road, 10th January
item.description:

item.title: Lane markings, 9th January
item.description:
Please can the approach to the roundabout have the same layout of lane markings as the other 3 exits, split into 2 lanes, left lane = left only, right lane = straight on or right, so it’s consistent and stops near collisions with people getting into two lanes (as there is enough room) and aiming for the same left hand lane to go straight over when joining the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lance Corporal Nicky Mason Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reference: 8364226, 9th January
item.description:
This issue has not been resolved and instead, you have closed the case. There is high risk of a fall. There have been several near misses of an actual fall but several incidents of trips. Please advise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Kingsmead Close, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road markings (faded and additions), 9th January
item.description:
Left hand lane on approach to roundabout needs ‘left only’ not “Lakeside” as both exit 1 and 2 from here are for Lakeside (and sign posted as such too). This would stop near collisions when people get in the left hand lane and then go straight across to the 2nd exit. Also the road markings to show you can go straight from the exit prior to the A126 need repainting. Have been faded for some time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Thurrock Way, South Stifford, Grays
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burst pipe under paving stone, 9th January
item.description:
There appears to be a burst pipe under the paving stone with water gushing out along the pavement, directly outside our house 99b Ivanhoe Road. The issue started yesterday and we reported it to Thames water but have not heard anything back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 105, Ivanhoe Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked across pavement all day/night, 9th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydenham Road, Perry Vale, Greater London

item.title: Fly-tipping, Thamesmead, 9th January
item.description:
Hi, I made two reports earlier, and seems a washing machine has now turned up. Would have been between 21:05 and 21:38 tonight. There is a sign but seems redundant. Please have collected. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Birchdene Drive, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Security van idling night and day next to primary school, 9th January
item.description:
For weeks a van carrying security dogs has been stationed in the yard beside / behind anvil house idling. The school is making admirable efforts to be a no idling zone and this flies in the face of it. It is threatening and polluting.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Matthias Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
